name: CalHFA First-Time Homebuyer Programs
description: Low-interest mortgages and down payment assistance for first-time California homebuyers
fullDescription: The California Housing Finance Agency (CalHFA) offers low-interest mortgage loans and down payment assistance to help first-time homebuyers afford their first home.
whatTheyOffer:
- Low-interest first mortgage loans
- Down payment assistance (up to 3.5% of purchase price)
- Closing cost assistance
- CalHFA Zero Interest Program (ZIP)
- MyHome Assistance Program
- Programs for specific groups (teachers, firefighters, etc.)
howToGetIt:
1. Must be first-time homebuyer (not owned home in 3 years)
2. Must meet income limits (varies by county)
3. Must complete homebuyer education course
4. Work with CalHFA-approved lender
5. Home must be primary residence in California
keywords: CalHFA, first-time homebuyer, down payment assistance, mortgage, home loan, California, low-income, homeownership
